mapper.insert: insert into ag_cms_fcm(scope, app_id, name, icon, type, props, data_bind_flag, uniq_code, remark) values ( #{e.scope}, #{e.appId, typeHandler=com.zhyea.argo.data.type.NullIntHandler}, #{e.name}, #{e.icon, typeHandler=com.zhyea.argo.data.type.NullStringHandler}, #{e.type}, #{e.props, typeHandler=com.zhyea.argo.data.type.NullStringHandler}, #{e.dataBindFlag}, #{e.uniqCode}, #{e.remark, typeHandler=com.zhyea.argo.data.type.NullStringHandler} )
mapper.select:
select f.*, a.app_name from ag_cms_fcm f left join ag_cms_app a on f.app_id=a.id where f.deleted=0
and f.app_id=#{appId}
and ( f.name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or f.remark like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') )
order by f.create_time desc
select f.*, a.app_name from ag_cms_fcm f left join ag_cms_app a on f.app_id=a.id where f.id=#{id}
